data.lyric:
[ti:my strange addiction]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:WHEN WE ALL FALL ASLEEP, WHERE DO WE GO?]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]my strange addiction - Billie Eilish
[00:00.10]Lyrics by：Finneas O'Connell
[00:00.21]Composed by：Finneas O'Connell
[00:00.31]The Office sample：
[00:00.40]No Billy I haven't done that dance since my wife died
[00:08.29]There's a whole crowd of people out there
[00:10.72]Who need to learn how to do The Scarn
[00:12.96]Billie Eilish：
[00:13.36]Don't ask questions you don't wanna know
[00:18.11]Learned my lesson way too long ago
[00:22.51]To be talkin' to you belladonna
[00:24.94]Shoulda taken a break not an Oxford comma
[00:27.75]Take what I want when I wanna
[00:30.35]And I want ya
[00:32.50]Bad bad news
[00:34.32]One of us is gonna lose
[00:36.75]I'm the powder you're the fuse
[00:40.00]Just add some friction
[00:42.22]You are my strange addiction
[00:46.92]You are my strange addiction
[00:51.40]My doctors can't explain
[00:53.79]My symptoms or my pain
[00:56.15]But you are my strange addiction
[01:00.86]The Office sample：
[01:01.58]I'm really really sorry I think I was just relieved
[01:04.76]To see that Michael Scarn got his confidence back
[01:06.72]Yeah Michael the movie is amazing
[01:08.00]It's like one of the best movies
[01:09.82]I've ever seen in my life
[01:11.00]Billie Eilish：
[01:11.09]Deadly fever please don't ever break
[01:15.41]Be my reliever 'cause I don't self medicate
[01:20.39]And it burns like a gin and I like it
[01:22.57]Put your lips on my skin and you might ignite it
[01:25.28]Hurts but I know how to hide it kinda like it
[01:29.48]Teh
[01:30.25]Bad bad news
[01:31.95]One of us is gonna lose
[01:34.35]I'm the powder you're the fuse
[01:37.60]Just add some friction
[01:39.79]You are my strange addiction
[01:44.54]You are my strange addiction
[01:49.03]My doctors can't explain
[01:51.36]My symptoms or my pain
[01:53.78]But you are my strange addiction
[02:03.86]Bite my glass set myself on fire
[02:08.15]Can't you tell I'm crass
[02:10.53]Can't you tell I'm wired
[02:12.93]Tell me nothing lasts like I don't know
[02:17.81]You could kiss my asking about my motto
[02:22.66]The Office sample：
[02:23.15]You should enter it in festivals or carnivals
[02:27.24]Thoughts Pretty good reaction
[02:29.47]Pretty cool right
[02:32.60]You are my strange addiction
[02:37.30]You are my strange addiction
[02:41.69]My doctors can't explain
[02:44.14]My symptoms or my pain
[02:46.54]But you are my strange addiction
[02:55.63]Did you like it Did you like that
[02:57.36]Um which part
data.trans:
[ti:my strange addiction]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:WHEN WE ALL FALL ASLEEP, WHERE DO WE GO?]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.10]//
[00:00.20]//
[00:00.31]//
[00:00.40]不 Billy 妻子逝世之后 我再也没跳过舞了
[00:08.29]外面来来往往都是人
[00:10.72]你可以教他们跳The Scarn
[00:12.96]//
[00:13.36]什么都别问 你不会想知道的
[00:18.11]很早之前我就明白了
[00:22.51]和你交谈时总会面红心跳
[00:24.94]我得休息一下 后面还有话说
[00:27.75]我会去争取自己想要的东西
[00:30.35]我想要你
[00:32.50]坏消息是
[00:34.32]我们之间总有一个会输
[00:36.75]我是火药 你是火线
[00:40.00]随时可能擦出火花 
[00:42.22]好奇怪 我疯狂迷恋着你
[00:46.92]好奇怪 我疯狂迷恋着你
[00:51.40]就连医生也不知道
[00:53.79]我为什么会有这些症状 为什么会心痛
[00:56.15]但我就是疯狂迷恋着你
[01:00.86]//
[01:01.58]非常抱歉 我本来以为自己解脱了
[01:04.76]看到Michael Scarn恢复了信心
[01:06.72]Michael 这部电影真的很好看
[01:08.00]绝对算是我这辈子看过的
[01:09.82]最佳影片之一
[01:11.00]//
[01:11.09]我已彻底沦陷 请不要和我分开
[01:15.41]帮助我缓解痛苦 我很难自愈
[01:20.39]身体像喝了金酒一样发烫 我很快乐
[01:22.57]你的双唇在我身上游走 激发我体内的热情
[01:25.28]虽然会心痛 但我的真情无法掩饰 我很享受
[01:29.48]//
[01:30.25]坏消息是
[01:31.95]我们之间总有一个会输
[01:34.35]我是火药 你是火线
[01:37.60]随时可能擦出火花 
[01:39.79]好奇怪 我疯狂迷恋着你
[01:44.54]好奇怪 我疯狂迷恋着你
[01:49.03]就连医生也不知道
[01:51.36]我为什么会有这些症状 为什么会心痛
[01:53.78]但我就是疯狂迷恋着你
[02:03.86]我咬着杯子 欲火焚身
[02:08.15]你不知道我很直接吗
[02:10.53]你不知道我现在很兴奋吗
[02:12.93]告诉我爱迟早会消失 我会假装不知道
[02:17.81]你可以夸夸我
[02:22.66]//
[02:23.15]你应该把这加入到节庆活动或者狂欢节中
[02:27.24]有什么想法吗 观众反应不错
[02:29.47]很酷的 对吧
[02:32.60]好奇怪 我疯狂迷恋着你
[02:37.30]好奇怪 我疯狂迷恋着你
[02:41.69]就连医生也不知道
[02:44.14]我为什么会有这些症状 为什么会心痛
[02:46.54]但我就是疯狂迷恋着你
[02:55.63]你喜欢吗 你喜欢吗
[02:57.36]你指哪部分
